title: Training Stress (TSS) in plain English - Cycling Performance 101

transcript.full_text: what is TSS when used correctly TSS is like a seat belt TSS keeps you from getting sick or injured as a definition TSS represents training stress proper TSS management helps keep you safe as well as improve your performance as intensity Rises training stress goes up exponentially be careful when increasing intensity if you overdo it you can lower your immunity and Bam you just want a mini vacation from training there is a relationship between weekly average TSS and performance the exact mathematical relationship is questionable attempting to maximize your TSS is also dangerous don't try to substitute intensity for duration TSS is much better as a seat belt than a gas pedal thank you very much
